## Actor.send() method

Sends an event to the running Actor to trigger a transition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
send(event: EventFromLogic<TLogic>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | [EventFromLogic](./xstate.eventfromlogic.md)<></>&lt;TLogic&gt; | The event to send |

**Returns:**

void
